question_types.title: Ask a simple yes/no question
queries: Do home crowds impact referee bias?

question_types.title: Ask a question about the relationship between concepts
queries: How does spanking impact childhood development?
What predicts success as a startup founder?

question_types.title: Ask about the effects of a concept
queries: What are the effects of gratitude practice?
What are the mental health benefits of psychedelics?
What are the effects of drug decriminalization?

topics.title: Supplements
queries: Is fish oil good for heart health?

topics.title: Economics
queries: Does raising the minimum wage increase unemployment?
What is the impact of climate change on GDP?

topics.title: Sleep
queries: Is social media bad for sleep?

topics.title: Medicine
queries: What is the best treatment for restless leg syndrome?
Are covid vaccines safe for pregnant women?
Does visceral fat increase the risk of cancer?
